text:
Being pleased by the invocation made by the deities Goddess Uma assured the deities about her arrival in this world.
 She told that her incarnation would take place in the house of Himalaya and by the virtues of her tremendous penance she would get lord Shiva as her husband.
 She also told the deities that she was satisfied by the service of Maina, done to her in the previous life.
 After being assured the deities went back satisfied.
title: Goddess Uma Consoles the Deities
